title: Can't equip Ward Skin I got from Hextech
body: I made the Bat-O-Lantern ward skin permanent but can't equip it. It's listed in my purchase history but it doesn't show up in the ward skin section of the shop.

replies.body: Having the same problem.. and yes I've restarted the client

Hey there,

This probably sounds silly, have you restarted your client since you made the ward skin permanent?
